thread.title: Ralph S.

author: Ralph S.
title: Ralph S.
text: I have been buying the flags for our church for several years. The flag pole is listed so the flag is exposed to all the weather north louisiana can produce and they have only lasted for a few months. The last two or three I have purchased from yall are the best I have found. They hole up extremely well against an almost constant wind and the faid resistance ie really the best I have seen. I always had to check them monthly for tears at the ends. Now I only cheked it about every two to 3 months. Love them
